title: Best of The Program | Guests: Mike Netter & Gad Saad | 1/19/21
description:
Journalist Katie Couric called for Trump supporters to be “deprogrammed,” and Democrats are still trying to tie Trump to Russia. “Recall Gavin 2020” coalition founding member Mike Netter joins to discuss the growing movement to recall California Gov. Gavin Newsom and rebuke claims that it has less support than it does. “The Parasitic Mind” author Dr. Gad Saad talks the behavioral psychology of the media, cancel culture, and what we must do to combat it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
